moves.name: Burning Grip
moves.info: You grab the enemy with a fiery hand.

moves.name: Crushing Blow
moves.info: You deliver a brutal overhead strike.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.info: You unleash a pulse of dark energy.

moves.name: Earth Spike
moves.info: You summon a rock spike from the ground below the foe.

moves.name: Fireball
moves.info: You launch a blazing fireball that explodes on impact.

moves.name: Flame Slash
moves.info: You ignite your blade and slash with burning force.

moves.name: Frost Nova
moves.info: You release a freezing wave that slows all enemies nearby.

moves.name: Heavy Kick
moves.info: You slam your foot into the enemy with great force.

moves.name: Holy Light
moves.info: You blast the target with pure radiant energy.

moves.name: Ice Spear
moves.info: You hurl a spear of ice that slows the enemy.

moves.name: Piercing Shot
moves.info: You fire a precise arrow that pierces armor.

moves.name: Poison Fang
moves.info: You bite with venomous teeth weakening the enemy.

moves.name: Quick Jab
moves.info: You attack swiftly before the enemy can react.

moves.name: Shadow Stab
moves.info: You vanish briefly and strike from behind.

moves.name: Shield Bash
moves.info: You are trying to bash the opponent away with your shield.

moves.name: Soul Drain
moves.info: You drain part of the enemy's essence to heal yourself.

moves.name: Thunder Fist
moves.info: You charge your fist with lightning and strike down.

moves.name: Venom Dart
moves.info: You throw a dart coated with fast-acting poison.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.info: You spin with full force and strike all nearby enemies.

moves.name: Wind Cutter
moves.info: You launch a blade of compressed air at high speed.
